participant_1.background:
I cannot stand salads.
My mother stayed at home all day to raise me and my siblings.
I graduated valedictorian of my high school class.
I had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents.
My father used to be an insurance salesman.

participant_2.background:
I grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
I love agatha christie novels.
I spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.
My husband and i have a suicide pact.
I have 5 children , though 2 have passed away.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of Agatha Christie novels.
Oh, that's great! I love them too. They're so well written and suspenseful.
I know, right? They're my favorite type of book to read.
Me too! I love the way she keeps you guessing until the very end.
I know! It's so much fun to try to figure out who the murderer is.
It is! I've been reading her books for years, and I still haven't figured out how she does it.
Me neither! She's a genius.
She really is.
So, what's your favorite Agatha Christie novel?
I'm not sure I could pick just one. I love them all. But if I had to choose, I think I would say Death on the Nile.
That's a great choice! I love that one too.
Me too! It's so suspenseful and the ending is so unexpected.
I know! I'm always on the edge of my seat when I read it.
Me too! It's one of my favorite books of all time.
Me too!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's great! I love working with kids.
Me too! It's so rewarding.
I know, right? It's the best job in the world.
